website_summaries.verdict: A classic that lives up to its reputations in terms of durability and practicality.
pros: Noted for its spaciousness and reliability
Ideal for travel as well most levels of school
Customers love that this backpack is consistent in regard to its appearance and function
cons: Covers the basics extremely well but may not suit professionals

customer_reviews.title: Great basic backpack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack. I use this for work and it’s great! It holds all my stuff while I’m driving a truck. Very sturdy and made out of good material it really doesn’t feel cheap at all. I also put my lunch box which is small into it. Looks nice and holds up to the quality of dickies products. Def a must buy for students or people traveling and working.
customer_reviews.author: Aleavitt49

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty! But could be more functional.
customer_reviews.text: It's a slightly different material than what I was expecting (i wanted something i could put patches and pins on, but iron on patches won't adhere to this material), and the straps keep coming undone (slipping through the plastic at the bottom of the strap), but it is very pretty. I'm probably going to have to see if the manufacturer or extra warranty covers the strap thing but i do really like the backpack other than the fact that it's hard to wear with the straps constantly coming undone. I didn't see anyone else complain of this though, so it's probably (unfortunately for me) just an isolated incident.
customer_reviews.author: cosmicdisaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack! We’ve purchased them before and they always seem to last a very long time making them an extraordinary deal. They are very roomy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Picture.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it very cute with all the different Vans she wears. Last year she had the "Trans Jansport Backpack" & this year it's "A Dickies Backpack" lol! She's not stoked with the name 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great backpack. My daughter is so pumped so have this for school. I really like the material it’s made out of, it’s very sturdy & I feel like it’s going to be super easy to clean. I actually really love this bag & I would even use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: i carry this bag to work everyday and it is the home EVERYTHING i do for out wedding. if it is wedding related i have the backback !! .. love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was a good book bag and lasted over a year. Wish it was a little more durable since the kids eventually used it so much the zipper slowly ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fabric backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a canvas bag. It looks and feels like a thick vinyl material. I hope it holds up, cute at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Julie727

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This backpack works greatfor my 7th grader. It's holding up well so far and carries comfortably with all of her stuff in it. Not a lot of pockets, which is ok, but it does have a bottle pocket. The color is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3rd grader for back to school. It is well made and exactly as pictured. She is in love
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Its a good backpack
customer_reviews.text: There was all kinds of markings on the inside and it was delivered somewhere 2000 miles ways but I got it and I'm keeping it. Other than that its a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: The top strap broke less than a week into the new school year. My daughter just picked it up from the top loop and it came out (I watched it happen)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my highschooler
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fantastic bag! Great quality and size. My daughter loves it and gets compliments all the time
customer_reviews.author: Krystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, no rips or tears yet (it's only ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves this. Good quality, no rips or tears yet (it's only been a month, tho)
customer_reviews.author: siedam

customer_reviews.title: Love it ♡♡
customer_reviews.text: For now, it's amazing! I love it so much. It also came super fast. Now, I just need to wait and see how long it'll last me. Fingers crossed! 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Carolina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pick
customer_reviews.text: i live for this backpack. It’s very lightweight but there’s not much padding on the straps which makes it a bit uncomfortable for carrying heavy items.its a nice weight. it’s semi waterproof and an overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got the brown one and i started wearing it every day instead of a purse, very spacious has a laptop slip, a drink holder, and a little pocket in the front very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and is holding up well to her 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked out this backpack herself. She loves it. Great quality and is holding up well to her 5 year old abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie and Richard Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: Bookbag is sturdy. I wish there was another spot to hold cups or drinks. Other than that, it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome much bigger than expected which is a plus for the money
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Great medium sized backpack! I really like the amount of options for designs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wrong
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light blue one waited an entire week and received the dark toned one instead. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Good, Sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy backpack. This is my second Dickies bag purchase. My first one was purchased in 2005 and is still in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not iridescnt
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. This book bag is rainbow colored but not iridescent. It’s not even shiny but a flat rainbow color. My daughter loves the book bag; that is the only reason I’m not returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Blair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this for school and I love it so so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful back pack.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grand daughter and she loves it. She loves the color and how durable it is. Many of her friends also like it.
customer_reviews.author: Erionexi Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was happy when her backpack arrived and so far it has worked for all her school needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Needs a pattern upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I like the composition book pattern, but would like it better with the "Name" and "Subject" plate up where they put the Dickie's logo. I'm hunting for a patch to put there instead. But it's been pretty sturdy, and I'm rough on backpack straps because I rarely use both at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyMouth

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat
customer_reviews.text: Seems warm and roomy. The material is nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Rosella Jane

product_meta.title: Dickies Luggage Student Backpack, Grape, One Size
product_meta.description: The everyday basic two pocket backpack that is great for a younger student. Our best-selling style.
